Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION

Title: Relates to prohibiting the sale of infant walkers and restricting the use of such infant walkers in certain settings
Summary: Prohibits the sale of infant walkers and restricts the use of such infant walkers in certain settings.
LawCode: Add ยง399-k, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of infant walkers and restricting the use of such infant walkers in certain settings
